resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::GatewayResponse`` resource creates a gateway response for your API. For more information, see [API Gateway Responses](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/customize-gateway-responses.html#api-gateway-gatewayResponse-definition) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.

properties.name: ResponseParameters
properties.description: Response parameters (paths, query strings and headers) of the GatewayResponse as a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.

type.description: Response parameters (paths, query strings and headers) of the GatewayResponse as a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.

properties.name: ResponseTemplates
properties.description: Response templates of the GatewayResponse as a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.

type.description: Response templates of the GatewayResponse as a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.

properties.name: ResponseType
properties.description: The response type of the associated GatewayResponse.

type.description: The response type of the associated GatewayResponse.

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

type.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

properties.name: StatusCode
properties.description: The HTTP status code for this GatewayResponse.

type.description: The HTTP status code for this GatewayResponse.

attributes.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::GatewayResponse`` resource creates a gateway response for your API. For more information, see [API Gateway Responses](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/customize-gateway-responses.html#api-gateway-gatewayResponse-definition) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.
